text: Stories you won’t hear on liberal media: Small businesses needed the regulatory relief they’ve gotten from @realdonaldtrump. The Johnson family shared their story with me and I was honored to speak about it on the floor. Looking forward to delivering the t-shirt to @POTUS soon! https://t.co/PguVLT2Xq7
